title: Divya Hotel Restaurant
description: Casual dining on the first floor of the hotel; small kitchen. Food is made to order and can be customize upon request. Vegans can ask for dishes without the cheese/paneer (usually a little cheaper). Ask to leave out MSG (say "no Aginomoto"). Friendly service. Moderate-expensive prices by local standard but affordable for foreigners.
streetAddress: 1st floor Divya Hotel, Laxman Jhula village
